thread.title: Gotachancetodance wins Belmont feature
thread.title_full: Gotachancetodance wins Belmont feature - Yahoo Sports

author: yahoo
title: Gotachancetodance wins Belmont feature
text:
Done NEW YORK (AP) -- Gotachancetodance rallied to beat Promotional by two lengths Wednesday in the $77,000 allowance feature for fillies and mares on the turf at Belmont Park.
The 4-year-old trained by Todd Pletcher has three wins and two seconds in six career starts.
Luis Saez was aboard for the 1 1/4 miles in 2:03.13 over the firm course.
Gotachancetodance paid $8, $4.60 and $3.50 as the 3-1 second choice. Promotional returned $10 and $5.30, and Achnaha paid $5.10 to show. Runner Runner, the even-money favorite, was fourth.
Sports & Recreation Todd Pletcher   20441/85227   1438/4545   474/5000
